messages.message: anyone know if we can create helpers for tests and import them? and if so, how? i see that the test files are all nested under `instabase_unit_tests`. should i import helper funcs like `from instabase_unit_tests.instabase.data_api_utils.helpers import BaseTest`
@dlluncor might have good insight on this? Unsure myself
yes you definitely can create helper libraries just like normal python libraries — let me point you to an example

https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/py-utils/refiner-utils/Makefile#L14

You can use PYDEPS_FOR_TEST (PYDEPS which are only included during test time, and not during our standard ‘make build’ time)

I typically inform users that these libraries are for test only by doing things like “test-utils”
